compliant.section: 本公司建立的個人資料簡介
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject has the right to be informed about the collection and use of their personal data.

compliant.section: 本公司可能主動建立關於您的個人資料檔案
compliant.legal provisions: Personal data must be collected for specified, legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes.

non_compliant.section: 您與我們之間的互動記錄
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing of personal data must be lawful and fair; it should not be excessive or irrelevant.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the legal basis for processing interaction records and ensure that data collection is limited to what is necessary.
